thread.title: Tesla CEO says could start China car production in 2 years -official blog
thread.title_full: Tesla CEO says could start China car production in 2 years -official blog | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Tesla CEO says could start China car production in 2 years -official blog
text:
SHANGHAI Oct 23 Tesla Motors Inc could begin producing cars in China in two years, chief executive Elon Musk said.
Local production could reduce the sales price of Tesla models in China by around a third, according to a transcript of his remarks at a Tsinghua University event in Beijing that was posted on the company's official blog late on Thursday. (Reporting by Jake Spring and Beijing newsroom)
